text: Oleg Vladimirovich Nikolayev (; born 21 May 1998) is a Russian football player who plays for FC Rotor Volgograd. ==Club career== He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Rotor Volgograd on 28 July 2016 in a game against FC Mashuk-KMV Pyatigorsk. He made his Russian Football National League debut for Rotor on 8 July 2017 in a game against FC Khimki. He made his Russian Premier League debut for FC Rotor Volgograd on 11 August 2020 in a game against FC Zenit Saint Petersburg. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Profile by Russian Professional Football League Category:1998 births Category:People from Luhansk Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Olimpia Volgograd players Category:FC Rotor Volgograd players Category:Russian Premier League players
title: Oleg Nikolayev
